Group 2 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Endpoint|5.0.0 to Extensions for Using Data Elements from FHIR R5 in FHIR R4

Source CodeRelationshipTarget CodeComment
Endpoint.connectionType (connectionType)is equivalent tohttp://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-Endpoint.connectionTypeElement `Endpoint.connectionType` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint.connectionType` as `SourceIsBroaderThanTarget`, concept domain: `NotRelatedTo`, value domain: `NotRelatedTo`.
Endpoint.description (description)maps to wider concepthttp://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-Endpoint.descriptionElement `Endpoint.description` has a context of Endpoint based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Endpoint`.

name: R5EndpointElementMapToR4
title: Cross-version mapping for FHIR R5 Endpoint to FHIR R4 Endpoint
description: This ConceptMap represents cross-version mappings for elements from a FHIR R5 Endpoint to FHIR R4.
